meanings.definition: A member of the family Staphylinidae, which includes rove beetles.
meanings.sent1: The staphylinid scurried across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: I found a staphylinid beetle under a rock.
meanings.sent3: Why did the staphylinid bring a tiny suitcase to the picnic?
meanings.sent4: The staphylinid moved like a tiny ninja through the grass.
meanings.sent5: The colorful staphylinid stood out among the leaves.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of rove beetles.
meanings.sent1: The staphylinid behavior fascinated the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The staphylinid species has unique markings.
meanings.sent3: The staphylinid party was full of adventurous insects.
meanings.sent4: Her swift movements were as agile as a staphylinid.
meanings.sent5: The staphylinid scent filled the air with a pleasant aroma.
